name: King's Quest: Mask of Eternity
description:
King's Quest: Mask of Eternity is an action, adventure and RPG game developed by Sierra On-Line. It came out on 01-01-1998. It was published by Sierra On-Line. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
King's Quest: Mask of Eternity is available on PC.
Mark Seibert produced the game. It was directed by Mark Seibert. Ben Houge, Kevin Manthei and Mark Seibert scored the game.
